description: Information relating to the death of an organism.
title: Death
name: death

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

cause_of_death.description: Cause of death from death report for human donor, from research lab for mouse.
cause_of_death.example: Hypoxic brain damage; Sudden cardiac arrest

cold_perfused.description: Yes if perfused with cold fluid to help preserve tissues before heart stopped. No otherwise.
cold_perfused.example: Should be one of: yes, no.

days_on_ventilator.description: Number of days on ventilator before death occurred.

hardy_scale.description: Value of 4-point Hardy scale cause of death classification: (0) ventilator case, (1) violent and fast death, (2) fast death of natural causes, (3) intermediate death, or (4) slow death.

time_of_death.description: Date and time of death of the organism, in format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ.

organ_donation_death_type.description: Type of death preceding organ donation (for organ donors only).
organ_donation_death_type.example: Should be one of: Donation after circulatory death (DCD), or Donation after brainstem death (DBD).

normothermic_regional_perfusion.description: Yes if entire body (but not limbs) was perfused with warm oxygenated blood. No otherwise.
normothermic_regional_perfusion.example: Should be one of: yes, no, or unknown.
